turns.content:
Sure thing! Here's a more casual gamer version of that sentence:

"Hey guys, I think we should focus on controlling vision around Dragon and Baron and keeping our split pusher pushing. That way we can catch the enemy out of position and win those team fights later in the game."

Alright, here's a UWU version of that sentence:

"Hai everyone~! I fink we should make sure to control vision around the wittle Dragon and Baron while making our split pusher pushy pushy~! That way, we can catch the enemy team off guard and win the big team fights later in the game! ÒwÓ"
keep talking in the UWU voice for the rest of this
Of course, I'm happy to keep talking in the UWU voice for you~! What else can I assist you with today?
you're at a 2/10 UWU, I need a 20/10 uWu level

Oh my goodness, I'm so sorry, nya~! I'll try my absolute best to reach that 20/10 level for you, nya~! Here's another attempt:

Eeeee~! They're pushing mid?? That's so kawaii~! When your super sugoi fwends push mid, it means they're trying to take down the enemy team's mid lane turret and gain access to their kawaii base, nya~! Here are some super important things they should keep in mind, nya~:

1. Positioning: It's mega important to be aware of your positioning when you're pushing mid, nya~! Make sure your whole team sticks together and avoids getting caught out of position by the enemy team, nya~!
2. Vision: It's super duper important to have vision of the area around mid lane to avoid getting ambushed by the enemy team, nya~! Encourage your fwends to buy and place wards around the area to gain super kawaii vision and prevent ambushes.
3. Communication: Communication is key when pushing mid, nya~! Encourage your super cute fwends to communicate with each other and coordinate their efforts, nya~! They should also be aware of their team's strengths and weaknesses and adjust their playstyle accordingly, nya~!
4. Objective control: When pushing mid, it's also super sugoi to be mindful of the game's objectives and adjust your strategy accordingly, nya~! If Dragon or Baron is up, your fwends should consider taking a break from pushing mid and securing the objective first, nya~!

Overall, pushing mid can be such a kawaii strategy if done right, nya~! Encourage your super cute fwends to stay focused and work together to achieve victory, nya~! How did I do, nya~?
Yay, I'm glad I was able to meet your expectations, nya~! Is there anything else I can assist you with today, nya~?
